author: absolute through äлёша
definition: Dimensional analysis of human cognitive functions as information processing architecture - mapping psychic information metabolism through geometric reduction

cognitive_functions.function: Discrete information processing modules with specific operational characteristics

0D_entities.evidence: Each cognitive function represents a discrete information processing unit

information_flows.input_streams: External signals → sensory processing → conscious awareness
information_flows.output_streams: Internal decisions → behavioral expression → external action
information_flows.feedback_loops: Environmental response → adaptation modules → behavior modification

processing_sequence.operational_flow: Signal input → filtering → core processing → output transformation
processing_sequence.adaptation_flow: Error detection → learning modules → pattern update → improved performance

1D_vectors.evidence: Information flows through sequential processing stages

functional_blocks.conscious_block: Base and Creative functions - primary information processing
functional_blocks.subconscious_block: Role and Painful functions - background processing and protection

2D_planes.evidence: Functions organized in systematic 2x4 block architecture

integrated_psyche.processing_center: Coordinated decision-making using all cognitive functions
integrated_psyche.adaptation_system: Learning and behavior modification through experience
integrated_psyche.interface_management: Input sensors and output controllers for environmental interaction

information_metabolism.function: Complete system for receiving, processing, and responding to information
information_metabolism.coherence: All functions work together to maintain psychological homeostasis
information_metabolism.optimization: System adapts to maximize effective information processing

3D_fields.evidence: Complete psychic architecture integrating all processing functions

metacognitive_awareness.function: Conscious observation of one's own cognitive processing patterns
metacognitive_awareness.self_monitoring: Recognition of which functions are active in different situations
metacognitive_awareness.process_optimization: Deliberate improvement of cognitive function coordination

system_understanding.perspective: Viewing cognition as information architecture rather than fixed ability
system_understanding.development: Conscious strengthening of weak functions and integration of strong ones
system_understanding.wisdom: Using understanding of cognitive architecture for better decision-making

4D_spectator.evidence: Metacognitive awareness enables conscious optimization of information processing

information_processing_mechanics.signal_filtration: Filter function screens incoming information for relevance and threat
information_processing_mechanics.core_processing: Base and Creative functions analyze and generate responses
information_processing_mechanics.background_monitoring: Daemon processes maintain system awareness without conscious attention
information_processing_mechanics.adaptive_learning: Learner and Listener functions update processing patterns based on feedback
information_processing_mechanics.output_control: System determines whether to express, suppress, or modify responses
information_processing_mechanics.error_handling: Void and Adapter functions manage processing failures and inconsistencies

coherence_patterns.functional_integration: All 8 functions contribute to unified information processing
coherence_patterns.processing_efficiency: System optimizes for speed and accuracy of responses
coherence_patterns.adaptive_flexibility: Architecture adjusts to handle new types of information
coherence_patterns.homeostatic_balance: System maintains psychological stability while processing change

practical_applications.cognitive_enhancement: Understanding function architecture for skill development
practical_applications.stress_management: Identifying which functions are overloaded or underutilized
practical_applications.learning_optimization: Matching learning methods to functional strengths
practical_applications.decision_improvement: Using all functions appropriately for better choices

reduction_examples.raw: Processing visual information through cognitive functions

reduction.evidence: Information flows sequentially through processing stages

reduction_examples.raw: Conscious processing block coordinating Base and Creative functions

reduction.evidence: Two functions working together in systematic relationship

reduction_examples.raw: System updating processing patterns based on experience

reduction.evidence: Metacognitive system observing and modifying its own processing

system_coherence_metrics.processing_speed: How quickly system can analyze and respond to information
system_coherence_metrics.accuracy_rate: Percentage of correct interpretations and appropriate responses
system_coherence_metrics.adaptation_flexibility: Ability to modify processing patterns when needed
system_coherence_metrics.integration_level: How well all 8 functions coordinate with each other
system_coherence_metrics.stability_maintenance: System's ability to maintain coherent operation under stress

integration_with_cfo.principle: Cognitive functions represent specialized 0D→1D→2D information processing units that integrate into 3D psychic field
integration_with_cfo.mechanism: Metacognitive awareness enables field + dimension = spectator transition in information processing
integration_with_cfo.goal: Transform unconscious information processing into conscious cognitive optimization
integration_with_cfo.coherence_optimization: Understanding cognitive architecture maximizes information processing effectiveness
